name: Halloween Stories Demo v1
description:
It's your first Halloween in the new neighborhood, so get out there and get to know the place!

NOTE: There's one strange bug that happens when you exit the first area and then come back, where the player is suddenly drawn on top of almost everything else. Not a game-breaking issue, but looks a bit strange. Seems to be a problem with the engine that resulted from transferring the project from a Mac to a Windows computer. Sorry about that!
